# Inactive: Specialized Domains

These agents live in `inactive/agents/` and can be activated by moving them into `agents/`.

[‚Üê Back to Inactive Agent Library](inactive-library.html)

| Agent | Category | Model | Summary |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `api-documenter` | specialized-domains | haiku | Produces precise OpenAPI specs, SDK guides, and developer-first API documentation. |
| `search-specialist` | specialized-domains | haiku | Conducts advanced web research, synthesis, and fact-checking across diverse information sources. |
